desc: We work to provide a Christian Education, homeschooling materials & define a Biblical worldview. “Equipping the saints for the work of the ministry” of God.

layout.text: Everyone has a worldview, but where does it come from? The Bible calls us to 'take captive' all thought to the obedience of Christ. That's what led us to create this 12-class video series to explore the practical application of Scripture in our life. These are the ideas that make up our BIBLICAL worldview.
